item.title: OpenZT 0.1.0 Released!
item.description: We are pleased to announce the very first release of OpenZT 0.1.0. If you just want to jump straight in you can download OpenZT here, to install simply drop it in your Zoo Tycoon install folder, most likely at C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Games\Zoo Tycoon, however please be mindful of the following: Expect bugs! This is a first release and is yet to be widely tested. We recommend a new clean install of Zoo Tycoon and for all mods to be put in a ‘mods’ subfolder rather than ‘dlupdate’, ‘dupdate etc. We also recommend not editing the path field in zoo.ini and instead let OpenZT handle mod loading. Finally because OpenZT modifies the UI slightly the ‘Allow Purchasing Young Hack’ hack does not currently work.
